desc.cn: Amazon Route53 中的动态 DNS。快速、轻松、私密地公开您的 EC2。
desc.en: Dynamic DNS within Amazon Route53. Expose your EC2 quickly, easily and privately.

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
echo 'deb [trusted=yes] https://fury.purpleclay.dev/apt/ /' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/purpleclay.list
&& sudo apt update
&& sudo apt install -y dns53

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add purpleclay https://github.com/purpleclay/scoop-bucket.git
&& x scoop install dns53
